website_summaries.verdict: A brightly colored bikini that's flattering on most figures.
pros: Available in a wide range of vibrant patterns and colors
Adjustable neck and back ties for the best fit
Made from a quality nylon-spandex blend
cons: Ruffled top floats up in the water

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and flattering! I’m a size 14 and got an XL. The colors are a little off (meaning the top and bottom are not the exact same coral color), and I wish the top had a clasp/hook closure instead of tie-back, but overall would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L.

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute and Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit! For me it fit true to my normal size, I am between a size 10 & 12 5'5 and weigh around 167 and I'm bottom heavy and the large fit me perfectly and made me feel so cute even with my little mom pooch that will never go away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this suit! I was scared that the sizing would be off but it fit me PERFECTLY!!! I ordered a medium based on another lady’s review on here. I am a 34DD and a size large in most pants or size 5-7(28-29) in junior jeans. I gained a lot of weight in the last year which has made me insecure but this suit fits my curves in all the right places. I don’t like my boobs to hang out because I’m scared of a slip. This covers them up! I love it! And the price makes it even more lovable!
customer_reviews.author: James Pete Glodjo Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottom fit, top didn't, but very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My bust size is 38D and I'm 190 pounds, and 5'7'' and I bought the XL. The top was too loose around the waist yet didn't fit my bust completely so I can't wear it. However, the bottoms fit perfectly and are really cute so I'm going to keep them and wear with a different top. The different top is shown in the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Colors are bright.
customer_reviews.text: Great suit for the price! The yellow and blue colors are so bright. I’m 5’7” 155lbs, size 36C on top and the Large fits me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Clancy

customer_reviews.title: So flattering!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 15 and loves this bathing suit. The bikinis offered in the main shopping outlets are too skimpy for her tastes and age! This is very flattering. The only thing she needs to remember is to double knot the top when tying around the neck and rib area!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love it. This swim suit was exactly what I was looking for I wanted something for my flat chest to hide my small boobies because I literally have none so this was perfect! Other suits show the huge gap from me being small chested and this top covered it but also not too covering to where it looks like a shirt. The bottoms are great I wanted something to hide my bottom half imperfections as well this swim suit is sexy and pretty at the same time. I definitely will be purchasing other colors in the future. Felt like it would be comfortable too. I got a size small. Im about 113-117 pounds and 5’7.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size! But very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Friday and received it yesterday (Sunday). I opened it today and it is very cute and the material is nice and I realized I got the wrong size!! I’m going on vacation in 2 weeks. I’m bottom heavy. I’m 5’5, 145lbs, a 36A, and a size 9 in jeans. I ordered a medium but I received medium bottom and large top! Im fine with the bottoms but I cannot fit the top, I’m okay with receiving a small but If not I need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Melanin Infused Beauty Nails

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but...
customer_reviews.text: I looked good in this swimsuit and enjoyed it . Company needs to be more careful with quality check, I only wore this once, it is the right fit, I wasn’t in a fight, was just lounging by the pool and the beach.... Now I have to sew it in order to wear it again. Not happy about that! Other than that, I recommend it. I am 5’2” and 130 lbs, ordered a medium, small would have fitted too but I wanted the girls nicely covered
customer_reviews.author: Lise M.

customer_reviews.title: Its kinda cute
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit was true to size and matched the description. I have a couple of issues with it tho. The top is padded, which is usually okay, but its thick and bulging. It kept shifting up in the water too which was a hassle. I don't want to have to adjust it every time i move. Also, with the frills on top, i felt like my chest was sticking out 6 ft. Prob would be better for someone with a flatter chest. but i love the colors and it did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Love this two piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this two piece. I’m extremely self conscious of my gut but I still want to be cute and wear a bikini. This was the perfect two piece. Fit as expected. I got an extra large and fit was perfect. The bottom do not rise or roll down and was slimming to my waist line.
customer_reviews.author: Isiasha Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits true to size beautiful color and hides imperfections. Must buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swimsuit for a trip next month. I'm 7 months pregnant and didn't want to order a maternity swim suit. I ordered this a size up and it is AMAZING!!!! the fit is great and it's not tight. The bottoms actually fit my butt instead of riding up. This is a must have. I paired it with a cover up I bought from here too.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Fits perfect, I am 5’4 180 lbs and the large fit perfectly. I think this type of bathing suit is flattering to all body types
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cute suit for a fashionable getaway
customer_reviews.text: Went to the Florida keys with this super cute suit. I ordered and got it within two days. Everything fit perfectly. The only hiccup was with the padding inside the top. It wasn’t flat so when I received it I straightened it out but the padding had been folded so long it left a crease. Either way it was still perfect. The ruffles on the top masked the crease. It was only something I noticed.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hang

customer_reviews.title: Cute bottoms, top is just okay
customer_reviews.text: Cute bottoms. I love the pattern and fit. I wanted to love the top, but it did not fit as well as the bottoms. The top fit too loosely, was not very supportive and I didn’t love the straps - I wish they were closer to the edges like a halter top. The orange color is fun and vibrant, but the colors on the bottoms are not as bright and look more red. I will probably paint the bottoms with a red top I already have. The bottoms are super cute and fit perfectly - they make this suit a winner! I ordered a small - I am 5’7” and 125 lbs
customer_reviews.author: TurboMom

customer_reviews.title: The swimsuit looks just like how it is in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The swimsuit looks just like how it is in the picture. The color and the material are of good quality. The fit was also very flattering, not too tight or revealing. For reference, I’m 5’4, 110 lbs, about a 30B/32A bust, and ordered a small. The top has two sets of strings that need to be tied (one by the neck and then the back). They seem pretty secure, but I will still need to test them. Overall, I highly recommend this swimsuit to anyone thinking of getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffy Duck

customer_reviews.title: Leg holes were small
customer_reviews.text: I find that with Amazon clothing purchases and women's bodies it's just a roll of the dice. I saw great reviews on this item and I almost kept mine despite the issue I had, but weirdly the leg holes were tight. I don't have large legs - I'm 5'7 and 145lb and I ordered a M. The top was perfect and I almost kept it for the reason, but I just wasn't comfortable in the bottoms. It grabbed a little tight even in my waist. But like I said, it's sometimes a roll of the dice! If you like it, follow the reviews and give it a try. I might have just received a poorly made suit. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger benckert

customer_reviews.title: Best Find!
customer_reviews.text: I never write product reviews, but I felt like I needed to let everyone know about this swim suit. Best find ever! I hate spending money on bathing suits, especially for how little material it is. I bought a large and wear a size 10, with DD cups. Its always hard for me to find something that fits and looks decent. I tried this on and I actually feel comfortable and nothing is popping out. Works perfect for my mom bod!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Size Medium!
customer_reviews.text: Size Medium! Loved it! It was perfect for my trip to Cancun! I’m 5”5 1/2 and weight 155 pounds. If I had ordered a large it would have been way to big. So glad I purchased a medium. I would definitely order a different color. This suit does not run small. Buy your size.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, fits!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this swimsuit!! I'm a mom of 3 and I felt so uncomfortable in the small bikini's! This one made me feel cute and confident! The fit is just right! I'm 5'2, 157lb 36C and a medium fits perfect as all mediums fit for me! No need to order a size down or up! I've already recommended this suit to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: j.wilson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but go one size up!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I love the design. There are two ties. One on the neck and one on the back. I found the best way to tie it by yourself is to tie it at the waist from the front, then pull it around and tie the neck. I thought it might be a pain but not at all and it made it easy to adjust. I did have to size up for the bottoms. I usually wear a L or 14 in pants so I ordered the XL and it fit nicely. The bottoms do not have a lot of stretch so definitely size up. I would definitely reccomend this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Memmelaar

customer_reviews.title: Size down .... maybe
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute two piece. I got this suit intended for myself, so I got an XL. I typically have to go up a size or two for bathing suits I’ve been that way since I was younger. I am 5’1 165 34B. Saying that, this suit was too large and I probably could have gotten away with a large and maybe a medium for the top. So depends on your frame. I gave it to my 19 y/o daughter who loves it. She is 5’6, wears a 14/16 in pants and is a 38/DD so if that tells you anything haha! This fits her so perfect and flattering. It’s a beautiful swim suit. Great material.
customer_reviews.author: Kala M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very good and secure coverage on top. Hides the fact that I am pretty flat cheated. Haha. Ruffles really flattering. Bottoms fit perfect! They don't dig in on the bottom and don't roll up and the top comes right up to the belly button. Never slides down. The quality of this swimsuit is amazing too! Feels like the very expensive kind.
customer_reviews.author: Ana H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit for a cheap price. Although a bargain the material is a good quality material, and provides decent cup inserts for good coverage. I like this suit fir tge most part but the bottoms make my behind look flat even though I have a decently shaped backside. And, the straps make my already wide shoulders look larger than I would like too. But, this is a good suit for at home use to jump the hot tub or cool off in the pool with the kiddos. I am 5'7" and weigh 208 lbs with a 36D chest and I ordered the 3XL and it fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is super cute and shipped next day! I'm a 41 yes old mom of 4 and I wanted more modest suits this year. Modest is hard to find when you're 5'7" and 103 pounds. I got the small in this suit and it fits me very well. Not too tight and not too loose. It also covers your rear. Pretty much just like the model. Thinking about buying in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, but its a cute suit
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this suit. There is nothing wrong with it. I'm 5'3", 36DDD top, and 160lbs. After reading all the reviews, I ordered a large. The material was sturdy and felt quality. The top fit great and I would be comfortable wearing it, but the bottoms were a little too big on me. Even if I had the medium, I don't think I can pull off the high waisted look (even though I really wanted to). Great suit to try, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy suit with great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I am athletically built at 5 ft 7 " and 170lbs. I have a smaller waist and am bottom heavy. I ordered a large. The swim suit fits super comfortably and the bottoms offer great coverage. I've never purchased a high rise swim suit and will say it is super flattering on my mommy fluff. Overall, the color is great, the material is well made and I truly feel sexy and classy. My only issue is I wish the straps detached. My top half is muscular with a layer over top and the way the straps cut make the unwanted side squish pop out a bit more but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Gamber

customer_reviews.title: Gf loves it
customer_reviews.text: Being one of those sets that you can't mix and match sizes, always a little hesitant to purchase cause my gf usually requires two different sizes and often sets like this are hit or miss. Mediums are sometimes better, Larges are sometimes better. For the sake of getting it for her, I ended up with a Large, which she thought the bottoms would be too big but they aren't quite as stretchy as expected so it actually worked out that way. Usually not the case.
customer_reviews.author: CodeRedAddictMD

customer_reviews.title: So cute just didn’t work for my body!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this suit! The material was a nice quality and the style is super cute! Especially if you have LOs to keep up with! That being said I’m 5’1 and 135 lbs so I ordered the medium. The top fit well and was flattering without being too revealing. However the bottoms were a little too tight on my thighs. I was going to exchanged for a larger size but I don’t think the larger top would’ve worked for my bust size! Such a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Scardasis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute for the price
customer_reviews.text: The model in this picture must be very tall compared to me. I'm 5'1 and about 120lbs. If I were to roll the bottom up completely while wearing the top, my stomach will not show at all. Therefore, I would usually roll the bottom to the legnth I want. The top is to long too, so I would tuck the last frill under. This looks really cute other than the sizing. I kind of wish I could pick a size for the top and bottom separately instead of small on both.
customer_reviews.author: FP896

customer_reviews.title: Same size
customer_reviews.text: I should have suspected both top and bottom wouldn't fit given I am a small up top and medium/large on bottom, but I thought I would try it out anyways. The top was the whole reason I bought it anyway, so I ordered a small set. The top fit really well, but the bottoms were useless- made my butt look flat, but like I said if I was able to buy the correct size it probably would have looked great. I ended up having to go to Walmart to buy $7 bottom to wear with the top. I wish you were able to mix and match sizes because one size DOES NOT fit all.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't order again.
customer_reviews.text: Im a 34DDD. The top doesn't fit very tight underneath so I feel like without a supportive tank top my breasts would just fall out. Even having it tied tight in the back isn't every supportive since the front isn't effected by how tight the back is tied. And if I ordered a size smaller too much side boob would show. So maybe for smaller chested women this isn't a problem. The bottoms were a little snug but still fit. My boyfriends sister has the same swim suit and she didn't have those problems with hers but she's not as large chested.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Apple shaped ladies, buy!
customer_reviews.text: So I gained 50lbs due to depression and stress. As I'm working on losing that weight I need a swimsuit. I've been nervous to buy and this was surprisingly flattering, comfy, and cute! I highly recommend. I'm 5'7" 179lbs, and apple shaped at present if that helps anyone. Bought an XL
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Comfy. Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! My favorite swimsuit I’ve ordered. Cute. Comfortable. Good quality. Love the high waist and that it not a low neck line. Was good on our family vacation. (I typically prefer 1 piece around the family but couldn’t find any cute ones) I was worried at first with the light colored fabric (especially the bottoms being mostly white) about them being see through when wet but this is very good quality fabric and I had no problems. I ordered a small. I’m 5’2”,34D,1-2 pant and it fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is so cute! Great fit and very nice quality. It feels and looks a lot more expensive than it is. I am a 31-year-old mom of 4 kids so I wanted something modest enough, but not too mature-looking. I love the high waist, which covers well, and the ruffle top is really nice. I will need to get another style of this suit, as it is a new favorite! I am 5'5 and 125lbs and bought the Medium which fits pretty true to size, a tad bit large, if anything.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: seems crocked and material is cheap
customer_reviews.text: at first glance I loved the color of the swimsuit... but after inspecting it i noticed that the flutter on the top was longer on one side than the other and the bottoms on one side were crocked with a weird pleat. I decided to try on to see if noticable ..... which is was. The top layer hung longer on one side. making is look funny any the bottoms fit wierd with that crocked pleat. overall the material was cheap as well. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: A Labat

customer_reviews.title: Cute and SUPER flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing high waisted bikinis for a few seasons and finally took a shot on this suit. This suit is SUPER flattering! It tucks away that lower post pregnancy belly that no amount of crunches can eliminage, and the ruffled top adds some volume on top. The best part is the bathing suit fit is really comfortable- no pinching squeezing edges that make you feel like a sausage. I normally wear a size 6 and this suit in Medium fit perfectly. I've only worn this a few times and have already received tons of compliments!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Super flattering swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is super flattering and accentuates the right areas. I’m 5’8”, 160, 36D and I ordered a size L. The bottoms fit perfectly, but the top was a little too big. The price is so great and I love the way I look in it. I highly recommend this to someone who doesn’t want to go full on bikini. The color is not exactly orange, but more of a hot peachy hue, perfect for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: stephistarr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So the colors of this bathing suit close up are probably going to be different than you imagined. But I will say in most photos and even when you look at yourself in the mirror, the colors that you see in the ad picture is pretty much what you'll see. The only thing is that when you're looking down at the bathing suit, it will look differently to you. Idk how to really articulate it, I'll try posting a picture later. It's flattering, you can't really beat the price. I bought a large on top, my only complaint is that there's a lot of fabric up there and I found it more flattering when I tuck the sides in.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but Short Straps
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 16 and ordered an XL and it fits great around my hips and waist and bust. The style is cute and the colors are beautiful. Only 2 complaints: 1) the straps that tie around your back are very short, making it difficult to tie securely, and 2) my bottoms came with some of the stitching already frayed. Nothing major, so I will snip them and keep the suit, but for these reasons it gets 4 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok... it fits in the right places... but not worth the wait.... customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I wrong a different review, but I FINALLY GOT THE BATHING SUIT AFTER WHAT SEEMS LIKE 2.5 months I tried it on and fits very nicely the bathing suit fits in all the right places but..... It isn’t worth the wait that I waited the material is meh thin. But It fits just right it’s very slim looking for anyone that is worried about the rolls getting out, I have this happen for my side boob but not in this swimsuit it’s ok... Customer service was fast and great tho so if you have issues they jump straight onto it!!!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa lap

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'7 180lbs and this bathing suit is adorable. I was a little iffy about this two ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7 180lbs and this bathing suit is adorable. I was a little iffy about this two piece because I do have broad shoulders and a narrow waist, and wearing a ruffly top emphasizes your shoulders, but I felt so cute in it! But I'm giving it 4 stars because since my shoulders are broad and my chest is bigger, it was a little small and my boobs did spill out a little underneath. But its still a great bathing suit!
customer_reviews.author: Amaqxwzon ~¿2Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bikini, although the top was a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bikini! I purchased the green bottoms with the green/pink printed top. I am 5'3", 130 lbs, 34D, and I purchased a size medium. The bottoms fit perfectly, but the top is a bit small. I will still wear it as the flounce top hides the fact that it's a bit too small. Had I purchased a large, I think the bottoms would have been saggy on me. The quality feels great and the colors are very vibrant. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Itzel

customer_reviews.title: Top Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 16 because that is my normal size. I'm 5'6 227lbs and my bust is a 44DD. With that being said the top is too small and the bottom is a perfect fit. Also if you notice there are two tears on the top. I would not buy from this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sekria D.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit for my daughter. She is self conscious of her stomach. This suit was just what she needed. Very flattering, good quality and doesn't break the bank! We actually ordered a couple of these suits because they were so flattering for her. We live on a lake so we live in our bathing suits in the summer. I know almost from the moment I open the package which bathing suits will survive the summer and which ones won't. This bathing suit will!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be adding pictures to my review once i take some
customer_reviews.text: i am 5’3 213lbs 38in waist 48.5 hips and a 14 in jeans and got the xxl which i usually am a xxl in bottoms and a xl in tops for bathingsuits the bottoms were a bit snug but still fits fine bc my other xxl bottoms are alittle big anyways and it wasnt as high waist as i expected but the bathing suit as a whole looks beautiful and great quality like as if i spent 40 for the whole thing instead of less than 20! will deff be purchasing more bathing suits on amazon for sure
customer_reviews.author: genny

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, maybe order a size up if you’re bottom heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love how the swimsuit looks on me! I’m heavy on the bottom and smaller on top, and the large fit the top perfectly! The ties allow you to adjust it tigger if you need it! The bottoms were a little tight around the private area, but other than that, they are great! I’d probably order a size up next time!
customer_reviews.author: Walisa

customer_reviews.title: 14 year old loves
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t seen this on my daughter yet. But she tried it on and said she absolutely loves it. At 14 she won’t settle for a bathing Sue. I saw the quality before I handed it to her and it was really good. I would’ve bought this if I saw it in the store hanging on the shelf for her. The bottoms are so cute I almost wanna pair for me
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Buy this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: For $20, this swimsuit is a STEAL. I’m 5’7 and 155lbs and I ordered mine in a Large. Fits absolutely perfectly, which NEVER happens for me when it comes to swimwear. Sadly, high waisted bottoms, no matter how badly I want them to, they never look right on me, despite the fact the fact that they fit perfectly. But the top is so darn cute and fits so well that I’m keeping it. It’s solid black with adjustable straps and cute dangling poms. It’ll go with any of my other bottoms. This swimsuit is like Amazon Gold, get it while it’s available!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Size for you may not be clothing size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item on a whim without looking through reviews so I hope this helps someone with picking the right size. I’m 5’3 and 210 lbs. I generally wear a size large in clothing. I ordered a XL and report that it fits quite well. I couldn’t be any larger tho and the bottoms still fit. The top is a little loose (I’m a 36D) but I think it will work fine. Will update when I take it out swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Great postpartum suit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! I am almost 6 months PP, and still not feeling ready for a bikini this summer. This bathing suit gave me the bikini-Feel without actually having to show my entire belly. It’s well-made and true to size. I am 5’5” and 133lbs with a C bra size, and a medium fits great. If your top half is larger than a C, I don’t think you will fit the bra part properly as the cups are small. It’s def more of a glam suit and not the one you would use to boogie board or do other physical activities as the top is all ties. Hope this review is helpful for other mamas or ladies!!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Christina Silvestri

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: So it’s super cute and seems to be made well. The price was amazing! I’m 5’9 160 lbs. I bought xl. My other bathing suits are large and looked like a squeezed into them. Not a good look and very unflattering on the botty. So I sized up this year and I was very nervous that I made the wrong choice but now that I have it I’m so relieved. Buy the suit it’s such a steal
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect retro style with tummy coverage
customer_reviews.text: Guys BUY THIS SUIT if you’re apple shaped like me! It fits perfectly. Wonderful for covering the tummy and still comfy. I’m a 14/16 in pants, 40DD and got the xxl because it said go one size up. The only thing is I wish the top had straps instead of ties but honestly it still looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying a suit online. I have a smaller bust but a big booty and after three kids my stomach is still a little bigger. This suit fit great though and looks good. I'm sure once the baby weight is off my stomach this will still be just fine. It's very comfortable and excited to wear it in Mexico. If there are issues in the Gulf or pool, I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Betthauser

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and vintage look!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fit.....runs a bit small so I ordered a medium and fits well. I'm petite and 114 lbs so wanted to hide my pooched out tummy. The ruffled top is fun and flirty! What a great price for such a stylish swimsuit! My only little complaint is there is very little elasticity to the legs so I'm not a fan of booty cheeks peeking out.....but I'm 63 so things are heading South, haha! But really love this suit!
customer_reviews.author: beadlesfan

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SWIMSUIT. Went on vacation and I've been having some body image issues. Nothing crazy, but I have put on weight and didn't feel as confident as I have in the past. Purchased this swimsuit because "F" it I was going on vacation and going to have a good time. And that's exactly what I did, I received a ton of compliments too! Swimsuit fit very nicely and was flattering
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I measured myself and followed the recommended sizing but the swim suit was still too small. The bottoms cut into me and didn’t specify front from back. (I tried both ways but it made little difference) The top was cute but cut lower around the armpit/sides than I expected. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Best swimsuit I've ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my swimsuit in the mail and I tried it on the second I got my hands on it, it fits amazingly and perfectly. It covers everything, which is a big bonus. I would definitely buy again and again. UPDATE, I have now wore the swimsuit two times and the string that tied in the back almost completely ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: buzz1

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. Material seems good quality. I'm 5'6" and 220 lbs and an XL fits me perfectly. Only worn it for one day so far but it immediately became my favorite swimsuit
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Top is blue
customer_reviews.text: The pic online made the top look more purple, to go along with the purple accents in the bottom piece. The top I received is blue, and doesn’t really match the bottoms. Luckily I have some other bottoms that will match the blue top, but I’m going to have to find a new top to go with the flamingo bottoms unfortunately. The suit is cute otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suit is exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The suit is really a nice suit, it looks exactly like the photo. I got a large, weigh 145 lbs and it fits well. The top doesn't have a lot of length to tie in the back but i double knotted it and it was fine. The bottoms (I have a super short torso and only am 5'4) didn't look right on me high waisted, but I was able to roll them down and they still stayed where they were and fit really cute. If not I would have returned it just because I didn't like the high waisted fit on me, but the look is cute. I would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and tried it on and it’s so cute!! Just as pictured I really love the fun pattern and the flattering top .. it covers my belly button which is what I wanted. I’m a large and ordered large to find it was a little small. I wear a side 10 but I’m happy with it & not sending it back for a bigger size it’s really manageable and I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and cure
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is so cute and the fabric is nice. I'll be buying more of these swimsuits because they fit great, covers well and stays in place. As a mom who takes two small children to the pool, I always have a kid grabbing me and when I wear this suit I don't have to worry about a wardrobe malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit well so was unflattering & miscoloring
customer_reviews.text: The color was s little brighter than pictured for the coral color. The bottoms were a little snug but the top was super big on me and looked horrible! This was not flattering at all on me. I believe that if I had either a large bottom and large breast or a small bottom and small breast than it would have fit. If you are not hourglass shaped or pencil thin than this isn’t going to fit right unless you buy two different sized bathing suits to fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: ARH4Life

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swimsuit after having looked at it online for almost a year. Although I'm generally very hesitant about buying swimwear when I can't try it on, I'm so glad I talked myself into buying this. It fits perfectly. It's comfortable. It's cute. And it's exactly what I wanted for my upcoming cruise. I am very picky about my swimwear and if I don't like it I will go through whatever the hassle is to return it. My adoration for this swimsuit is so much that I'm considering getting another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hild

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms were spot on/top cups too small
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’8” with a DD top. I went by the size chart and ordered XL, but the top cups are way too small. However, the bottoms for pretty well and I really liked them. Since I only paid $10 for the suit. I don’t consider it a loss, but the top is pretty much unusable for me. I just used another solid top I had and it gray with the bottoms!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Glover

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I am in love and will buy another. Makes me feel confident and beautiful in this bathing suit which I feel is so very important for women to feel when it comes to bathing suits. I'm a mom of 2 and it hides my stomach very well cause of the high waist. I have a big chest of 32 DDD and I love how the top fits. Much bye you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this suit! The pom trim is so cute & adds an extra layer of fun to the suit. The bottoms fit perfectly with good coverage and the print is perfect. I ordered a medium which is my typical size and was pleasantly surprised that the top fit so well without feeling like there was too much fabric. Being small busted, tops usually feel full & bulky but this one doesn't. Can't wait to wear it this summer!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: The best swimsuit ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely could not LOVE this swimsuit anymore! I am 5’3”, 120 lbs and ordered the medium. The fit is absolutely perfect. It is lined, with light removable padding. The bottoms come right above the navel, and the back is completely covered! 100% LOVE IT!! I want to order in every color now!!! On a side note, the swimsuit and package were covered in what appeared to be dog hair (???🤔🤔🤔) but I don’t even care bc I love the suit I got for $18!
customer_reviews.author: carley

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this swim suit. I headed to the Philippines and so I t’s very conservative over there so I was trying to find something cute to where my mom wouldn’t complain. Otherwise she would of made me wear this ugly one piece cheetah leopard swim suit. When I wore this in the Philippines she actually liked it. So yay win win in my book! But I really love this swim suit! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with larger chests
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms fit well but the top was not supportive enough for me. I am 5'10", 200 lbs, size 12/14, 36DD and ordered XL. I couldn't get the top tight enough for me to avoid underboob slippage. I suppose it would be fine for sitting by the pool but I plan to be chasing a toddler so back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I brought this two pieces for me and it is so cute. The fabric is good and it keeps your tummy in. I just dislike how ruffle the top fit me so I just gave it to my daughter and she loves it. By the way it runs a little small I had to order a X large instead of a large.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Awesome bathing suit! My husband and I are going on a cruise next month and I’m excited to wear it. I’m 5ft 3.5in tall and weigh 150lbs and curvy. I ordered a medium and it fit great! Love the high waisted bottom as it covers my belly. Great value for the money. I ordered a second one (different color)!
customer_reviews.author: Zory W

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bikini! I wear a size S in tops and size M in bottoms, usually, so i go with the M and hope for the best lol This bikini fits so nicely! The top is very forgiving and the cups are nice. The bottoms fit nicely without cutting into the leg/butt. Colors and print are vibrant and true to the picture. Haven't tried it in the water yet so I cannot comment on durability. Quality seems good. Highly recommend, if you're on the fence: Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Bino

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered a medium but the leg holes were tight. Normally wearing size 8 jeans. This is for a girl with big thighs but still has a waist. The medium waist fit fine so I thought a size large waist would be too big. Returned very easily and ordered a large. It fit perfectly and is super cute. Legs fit and no problem with the waist fitting too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much I had to get another one
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues with my weight these past few years and it makes my uncomfortable to be in a bikini. This higher waist bikini changed that for me! It is so comfortable and I feel like my old self walking around in this bikini. Even my husband thinks it’s really cute! I love it so much I purchased a second one
customer_reviews.author: CamrynMcLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: The only two things that could make this suit better would be if the top had underwires and fir ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size i- US Womens sizes. Print exactly as pictured. The only two things that could make this suit better would be if the top had underwires and fir more like a bra and you did not have to tie the back. A clasp top would have been better. The bottom was perfect high waist size too
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this suit!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this suit! I am blown away but how great it fits. I can never find a swimsuit that fits well for the right price in stores, let alone online! So I took a gamble and it was worth it. I read the reviews and followed the other girls advice and it worked. So heres my help: I am 5'2", 130 pounds, 34DD-32DDD and ordered the size medium. Bottoms fit like a glove and with a lit adjusting and tucking the top fits as close to perfect as it can get. I'm ordering another one of this suit right now!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer bikini
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old wanted a bikini but didn’t want to feel “exposed.” The color of this suit is BEAUTIFUL, despite the bad lighting the suit is actually the prettiest bright coral color. My daughter is 5’1” and 156 pounds, B cup chest and we bought the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani D.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, not for large breasts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Large of this suit. I’m 5’4’’, usually wear a size 10-12, chest 34D. This suite was very cute, and the bottoms fit very well, but the top did not cover me in a way that I felt comfortable with. I gave the suit to a friend of mine with a smaller chest and she looks adorable in it! If I would have sized up to a XL I think it might have worked l, just if anyone is thinking about it with similar measurements :)
customer_reviews.author: S.E.

customer_reviews.title: No support up top
customer_reviews.text: The suit over all was comfortable however there is absolutely no support up top and very little fabric to tie the back. A small hop or shift would have the girls falling out the bottom if you have any. Outside of that, it is a really well made suit and the bottoms are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Malice.Alice

customer_reviews.title: The top fit fine and the bottoms fit perfect around the waist but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our beach trip. I ordered a medium after reading reviews. The top fit fine and the bottoms fit perfect around the waist but were too small around my butt/legs. It wasn’t until after I washed it that I saw the bottoms were labeled size small!!! Instead of returning it, I gave it to my sister and it looked really cute on her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing can be odd
customer_reviews.text: I love the print and colors of this suit! It’s a great style as well with the high waist and ruffle top. I’m 5’6” and about 175lbs, and I ordered the large based on other reviews. The top is just a bit too big and the bottoms are just a bit too small. I can make the suit work but it’s not going to be one I reach for all summer due to the size being a bit wonky.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Need to offer top and bottom seperate
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but I hate that I can't order the top and bottom seperate. Ideally I would need a large top and small bottom. I bought a medium. The bottom is almost a little big but it will work and the top is a little tight. I'm 125 lbs size 34DDD size 4 pants.
customer_reviews.author: angela ott

customer_reviews.title: Buy the suit!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bathing suit! I was nervous on getting the XL but so glad I did. I am a bit bigger chested at the moment due to nursing and this fits great! Love the bottoms. The whole suit is just flattering after having a baby 4 months ago. My new go to for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this bathing suit. The bottoms are so comfortable and flattering, and the top is just so cute! I bought a large, I wear a 34 D bra and typically a 10 in pants. I'm short, 5'1" about 150lbs was looking for more coverage of the tummy after gaining some weight and this was perfect. Very flattering and made me very confident and happy
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: 2 different sizes in the package, not what was ordered
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive this package, and upon opening it, I was very surprised to see that the top was a different size than the bottoms, and even more so surprised that it was a different size than what I had ordered. I ordered a Large, and got the large bottoms which fit perfectly, but the top came as a small, which was indeed too small. So I had to call customer service and get it all returned and had to reorder the entire suit again in a size large. I'll edit this if i get the correct order!
customer_reviews.author: SusieMam

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swimsuit. It does not show too much. I bought it for my middle school daughter, and it was appropriate. It is not see-through. Strings tie on back, no hook attached. Comfortable, and does not come off after jumping off the diving board.
customer_reviews.author: Zinnia_Flower

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The bathing suit is super cute and made with great materials. I just didn’t like how it looked on me. The bottoms came up to high and the top had too may ruffles that seemed to stick out far. I feel this bathing suit is made for someone with a long torso and smaller breasts. I am 5’2 and weigh 150, bra size 32DD.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The top ripped at the seam, after only second time wearing it! There must have been a small tear already for it to come apart like that. The suit fits well, and looks cute, so I'll just sew it up, but things like that shouldn't happen after only a few uses! Also, the top is a bit bulky, and when I'm fully submerged, it floats up, making me look like a lilypad lol.
customer_reviews.author: camquatch

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suite is super comfy and I absolutely love it! I am 5' even 155 lbs, currently the biggest I have ever been. So I was super nervous about wearing a bathing suite to an amusement park, but this made me feel a million times better and more comfortable. I love how it's a two piece yet it still covers my butt and stomach.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is spot on! Definitely U.S sizing.
customer_reviews.text: For reference I am 5'7 135lbs I usually wear a small top and size 4 or 27/28 jeans. I ordered a small and it fit perfectly. Size chart was spot on. I absolutely love the bottoms of this suit! The top the ruffles are quite big and stick out quite a bit especially under the arms but not horrible. I bought the green suit and it's exactly like the photos in other people's reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Peacefulchaos

customer_reviews.title: Not for large chests
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not made for people with large breasts. The cup/top area does not seem larger at the sizes increase. As a 36 DDD there are not enough coverage or support. Had to return. I am sure that it would work great if you had a smaller chest. This style offers more support for larger breasted women. Sturdier straps, and thicker fabric for the bottoms too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Huston

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this suit according to the size chart, but it was very tight! I was able to return it and get a refund. Other than it not fitting, I gave it 4 stars because the quality of the suit was great and I really, really loved the way it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The top is super cute and fits perfectly. After reading the reviews I ordered a size Large. I'm a 10 and 36C/D on top. The top fits perfectly, but is a bit cheap and came with strings at the seams. The bottom fits great at the top and the thigh holes are really small. Compared to other bottoms I have the leg holes are really narrow and flattens my booty! If I ordered it in an XL, the top would have been too big. Color and pattern are the same as the pics and really cute for pool time and summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Setzer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I am about 5'11 190 lbs and very hippy. I have a hourglass/pear shape. This bathing suit fits amazing! I had to take out the removable cups because the cups felt a bit awkward but besides that I feel so confident and sexy in this!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: True to your own size
customer_reviews.text: This particular bathingsuit fit me perfect & it was true to size, I wear medium and bought size Medium. This was VERY NICELY MADE WITH GREAT MATERIAL / FABRIC. Heat Move representatives are their for you ready to help you with any questions, I was very happy with my purchase and the price.Thank you Dancing fire
customer_reviews.author: Dancing fireTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: What a value!
customer_reviews.text: This cute suit has the perfect top for me because it is fully adjustable. Ties in back and around neck. My favorite as hooks always make a suit to big for me. I’m 32f bra so need to cinch up around back. I’m buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Linn

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not on me
customer_reviews.text: I’m short wasted and this style apparently doesn’t work. But the whole thing was just to big for a small. I’m 5’4” and 118 and I needed at least one size down. Material quality was good and quality was good just fits to big
customer_reviews.author: mandy kemp

product_meta.title: Heat Move Women Retro Flounce High Waisted Bikini Halter Neck Two Piece Swimsuit
feature_bullets: Designed：Ruched double ruffled flounce, adjustable ties at neck and back,Removable Push up Padded Bikini Top,printed bottoms,bottom with lining non see through.
Classic coverage: Falbala top swimwear matches with printed bottoms,Retro swimwear will make you regain confidence and fabulously show your curves.
Best choice for summer beach,swimming pool,SPA,Solarium, unique design
Please Refer To Our Detailed Size Chart below the product description Before You Purchase.
